Content: **PylonicPvP**NLNLWhat are we?NLNLPylonicPvP is a Minecraft server with a  lot of history with a lot to offer. We had to shut down due to lack of players but we're coming back :DNLNLWe offer a lot of features including - Gen buckets_ Printer_ custom map_ and much more!NLNLWe have constant community polls that help shape the server_ so that we can cater to what the community wants :)NLNLWe have a dedicated staff team that never abuse or mistreat players or their permissions. They are always willing to help_ but if you have an issue the staff cannot fix_ the owners will be able to answer any question within 24 hours.NLNLWe will have more info on our discord as we figure out the course we will take.NLNLWe offer invite rewards so all you have to do to get a head start on BETA is invite a lot of people to our discord and you will get prizes!
